title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [Get your Typophile gear on](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806190456/http:/typophile.com/node/35679 "Get your Typophile gear on")

Typophile is pleased to announce an online shopping interface (still in pre-gussied-up CSS, but still very much usable) to make the 2007 tee and found type ephemera buttons available.

**[Typophile Merchandise](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806190456/http:/typophile.bigcartel.com/)** - mens and women’s tees, found type buttons

Also see:  
 [The making of pics of the found type ephemera](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806190456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35569)

[The behind the scenes of the 2007 “Type Specimen” tee](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806190456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35469)
author: Joe Pemberton
